test-case.name: artifactsNotFound
test-case.description: Ensures that artifacts are not found, when softare module does not exists.

test-case.name: tooMuchDeploymentActionMessagesInFeedback
test-case.description: The server protects itself against too large feedback bodies. The test verifies that it is not possible to exceed the configured maximum number of feedback details.

test-case.name: changeEtagIfActionSwitchesFromSoftToForced
test-case.description: Checks that the deployementBase URL changes when the action is switched from soft to forced in TIMEFORCED case.

test-case.name: badDeploymentAction
test-case.description: Test various invalid access attempts to the deployment resource und the expected behaviour of the server.

test-case.name: missingFinishedAttributeInFeedbackReturnsBadRequest
test-case.description: Ensures that a missing finished result in feedback body returns a bad request.

test-case.name: deplomentAutoForceAction
test-case.description: Attempt/soft deployment to a controller including automated switch to hard. Checks if the resource reponse payload for a given deployment is as expected.

test-case.name: missingResultAttributeInFeedbackReturnsBadRequest
test-case.description: Ensures that a missing feedback result in feedback body returns a bad request.

test-case.name: rootRsSingleDeplomentActionWithErrorFeedback
test-case.description: Verfies that an update action is correctly set to error if the controller provides error feedback.

test-case.name: deplomentForceAction
test-case.description: Forced deployment to a controller. Checks if the resource reponse payload for a given deployment is as expected.

test-case.name: deplomentAttemptAction
test-case.description: Attempt/soft deployment to a controller. Checks if the resource reponse payload for a given deployment is as expected.

test-case.name: invalidIdInFeedbackReturnsBadRequest
test-case.description: Ensures that an invalid id in feedback body returns a bad request.

test-case.name: tooMuchDeplomentActionFeedback
test-case.description: The server protects itself against to many feedback upload attempts. The test verfies that it is not possible to exceed the configured maximum number of feedback uplods.

test-case.name: badDeplomentActionFeedback
test-case.description: Various forbidden request appempts on the feedback resource. Ensures correct answering behaviour as expected to these kind of errors.

test-case.name: multipleDeplomentActionFeedback
test-case.description: Multiple uploads of deployment status feedback to the server.

test-case.name: rootRsSingleDeplomentActionFeedback
test-case.description: Verfies that the controller can provided as much feedback entries as necessry as long as it is in the configured limites.

test-case.name: artifactsExists
test-case.description: Ensures that artifacts are found, when software module exists.

label.name: feature
label.value: Component Tests - Direct Device Integration API
